<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/me/entitlements"}

>

Get the entitlements a user has purchased externally where a mapped SKU exists on the game.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"X-Modio-Portal","in":"header","description":"The portal the request is targeting.","required":true,"example":"steam"},{"name":"game_id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the game to check entitlements against. _*Not required when g-url is used._","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1010}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
